title.en: The Lung of the Emerald Void

description.ko: 생물학적 엔진이 빛을 호흡하는 거시적 시각화로, 생물 발광 질감을 통해 자연의 유기적 흐름을 표현합니다.
description.en: A macroscopic visualization of a biological engine that breathes light, representing the organic flow of nature through bioluminescent textures.

prompt: An ultra-macro cinematic masterpiece of AURA-7, featuring a pulsating lung-shaped organism made of translucent #7FB069 emerald moss and deep #2D5A3D vascular vines. The entity is suspended in a pitch-black underwater atmospheric void, inhaling swirling #E6F2E1 bioluminescent spores. Rhythmic #FFE66D liquid sap pulses through the mossy membranes, creating a living internal glow. 8k resolution, Unreal Engine 5, Octane Render, hyper-realistic fluid dynamics of liquid light, volumetric light shafts, breathing organic texture.
